messages.title: Securing a future fair for all
messages.content: Labour's pledges for a future fair for all are substantial, deliverable, and fairly costed, speaking to the values of Britain's mainstream majority.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Halve the deficit through economic growth, fair taxes, and cuts to lower priority spending.

Raise standards, keeping mortgage rates as low as possible; increasing tax credits for families with young children; providing new help for first-time buyers; and restoring the link between state pension and earnings from 2012.
Protect frontline investment in policing and the NHS, with a new guarantee of cancer test results within a week.

Strengthen fairness in communities through an Australian style points-based immigration control system to count people in and out; apprenticeships and jobs for young people; a crack down on anti-social behaviour.

Build a high tech economy, supporting businesses and industry to create one million more skilled jobs and modernising our infrastructure with High-Speed Rail, a Green Investment Bank and broadband access for all.

issues.economy: Halve the deficit through economic growth, fair taxes, and cuts to lower priority spending.
issues.education: Raise standards, keeping mortgage rates as low as possible; increasing tax credits for families with young children.
issues.health: Protect frontline investment in policing and the NHS, with a new guarantee of cancer test results within a week.
issues.immigration: Strengthen fairness in communities through an Australian style points-based immigration control system to count people in and out;

housing.content: providing new help for first-time buyers

politicalExperience.achievements: Brought millions of pounds of investment into the area, helped thousands of people with individual problems, been a strong voice for our community in Parliament, and stood up for local people on everything from the future of the Ford site and green spaces to local schools and policing.

endorsements.endorsement: John Denham has been a great local MP, a strong Minister for Southampton and Britain. His hard work has made a real difference to people’s lives and to Southampton’s future.

quotes.text: John has been a great local MP, a strong Minister for Southampton and Britain. His hard work has made a real difference to people’s lives and to Southampton’s future.
